scripts.install: npm i -g tailwindcss gulp gulp-concat gulp-clean-css gulp-uglify
scripts.link: npm link tailwindcss gulp gulp-concat gulp-clean-css gulp-uglify
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m 'changes' && git push origin main
scripts.pages: git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
scripts.update: picogen clean  && npm run tailwindcss && picogen generate -s -f && npm run push && npm run pages
